Package org.codehaus.preon.annotation

The package providing the default annotations used to add metadata on how fields must be encoded in and decoded from a BitBuffer.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BoundString.Encoding  
 

Annotation Types Summary
Bound A general purpose 'marker' annotation, indicating that a certain field is considered is expected to be retrieved from a BitBuffer when invoking Codec.decode(org.codehaus.preon.buffer.BitBuffer, Resolver, Builder).
BoundBuffer An annotation for marking a byte array to be bound to be bound.
BoundEnumOption An annotation used to annotate enumeration values, in order to make sure they can be mapped to long values read from the BitBuffer.
BoundExplicitly An annotation marking a certain field to use a *specific* type of Codec to bind it to the BitBuffer.
BoundList The annotation used to mark List fields as potential candidates to be bound to a BitBuffer.
BoundNumber The annotation to add metadata on the way an integer field is represented in the BitBuffer.
BoundObject An annotation for marking fields to be bound to the BitBuffer.
BoundString An annotation for adding metadata to String fields, informing the framework how to decode and encode the data.
ByteAlign An annotation to make the framework append padding bits to byte-align the cursor after having read the data.
Choices The annotation allowing you to define a number of choices, based a prefix of a certain size.
Choices.Choice The annotation holding a single choice.
If A simple annotation for marking particular fields to be optional, depending on the condition.
Init An annotation for marking an operation to be invoked when an object has been decoded entirely.
LazyLoading An annotation to mark a field to be loaded lazily.
LengthPrefix The annotation used to indicate the discriminator used to recognize an instance of this class.
Purpose A (probably) temporary solution for adding documentation to the fields to be used while generating documentation on the file format.
Selector The annotation used to set a specific Selector when having to choose between multiple Codecs.
Slice The annotation to be used if you want to make sure that only a slice of the underlying BitBuffer is passed on while decoding a (compound) value.
TypePrefix The annotation used to indicate the discriminator used to recognize an instance of this class.
 

Package org.codehaus.preon.annotation Description

The package providing the default annotations used to add metadata on how fields must be encoded in and decoded from a BitBuffer.
